data.meta_description: Credit Risk Update: SECURED CREDITOR INFORMATION:, MEGGITT AEROSPACE HOLDINGS LIMITED,PILOT WAY, ANSTY BUSINESS PARK, COVENTRY, CV7 9JU.
data.text:
Credit Risk Update: SECURED CREDITOR INFORMATION: MEGGITT AEROSPACE HOLDINGS LIMITED, PILOT WAY, ANSTY BUSINESS PARK, COVENTRY, CV7 9JU. The legal status is a Private Limited Company and the current status at the registry of companies is Active. The last filed accounts are dated 30 June 2023. The company was incorporated on 16 July 1998.

The accounts next due date is 31 March 2025. There are 2 mortgages, 1 satisfied, none part satisfied and 1 unsatisfied.

The above was based on public record information as at 17 August 2024 and may not reflect the current status. Please access the current report to ascertain the current status and credit rating.
